title: Welcome to the New ZTAP!
content: We have successfully migrated to a new, faster architecture. Enjoy the improved performance!

title: Important: ZTAP Inactivity Data Deletion Policy
content: ✨ We’d love to keep you with us! If you don’t log in for 90 days, your ZTAP account will be removed. Just sign in from time to time to keep everything safe and active.
